info.description: Convoy is a fast and secure distributed webhooks service. This document contains Convoy's API specification.
info.title: Convoy API Specification

get.description: This endpoint fetches an application by it's id
This endpoint fetches an application's endpoints

post.description: This endpoint creates an application endpoint

get.description: This endpoint fetches an application endpoint

put.description: This endpoint updates an application endpoint

delete.description: This endpoint deletes an application endpoint

post.description: This endpoint resends multiple app events

get.description: This endpoint fetches an event delivery.

put.description: This endpoint resends an app event

get.description: This endpoint fetches app events with pagination

post.description: This endpoint creates an app event

get.description: This endpoint fetches an app event
This endpoint fetches an app message's delivery attempts
This endpoint fetches an app event delivery attempt
This endpoint fetches a group by its id

data.description:
Data is an arbitrary JSON value that gets sent as the body of the
webhook to the endpoints

provider_id.description:
ProviderID is a custom ID that can be used to reconcile this Event
with your internal systems.
This is optional
If not provided, we will generate one for you

endpoint.description: Endpoint contains the destination of the event.

data.description: Data to be sent to endpoint.

next_send_time.description:
NextSendTime denotes the next time a Event will be published in
case it failed the first time

num_trials.description:
NumTrials: number of times we have tried to deliver this Event to
an application

data.description:
Data is an arbitrary JSON value that gets sent as the body of the
webhook to the endpoints
